documentation.text:
@notice The interface for setting a fee on swap or fee on withdraw to the hook
 @dev This callback is only made if the Fee.HOOK_SWAP_FEE_FLAG or Fee.HOOK_WITHDRAW_FEE_FLAG in set in the pool's key.fee.

devdoc.details: This callback is only made if the Fee.HOOK_SWAP_FEE_FLAG or Fee.HOOK_WITHDRAW_FEE_FLAG in set in the pool's key.fee.

returns._0: The hook fees for swapping (upper bits set) and withdrawing (lower bits set).

getHookFees((address,address,uint24,int2.notice: Gets the fee a hook can take at swap/withdraw. Upper bits used for swap and lower bits for withdraw.

userdoc.notice: The interface for setting a fee on swap or fee on withdraw to the hook
